verses.verse: Woe<WH1945> be unto the pastors<WH7462> that destroy<WH6> and scatter<WH6327> the sheep<WH6629> of my pasture<WH4830>! says<WH5002> the Lord<WH3068>.

Therefore thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH3068> God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478> against the pastors<WH7462> that feed<WH7462> my people<WH5971>; You have scattered<WH6327> my flock<WH6629>, and driven them away<WH5080>, and have not visited<WH6485> them<WH6485>: behold, I will visit upon you the evil<WH7455> of your doings<WH4611>, says<WH5002> the Lord<WH3068>.

And I will gather<WH6908> the remnant<WH7611> of my flock<WH6629> out of all countries<WH776> where I have driven<WH5080> them<WH7725>, and will bring them again to their folds<WH5116>; and they shall be fruitful<WH6509> and increase<WH7235>.

And I will set up<WH6965> shepherds<WH7462> over them which shall feed<WH7462> them<WH3372>: and they shall fear no more<WH2865>, nor be dismayed, neither shall they be lacking<WH6485>, says<WH5002> the Lord<WH3068>.

Behold<WH3117>, the days come<WH935>, says<WH5002> the Lord<WH3068>, that I will raise<WH6965> unto David<WH1732> a righteous<WH6662> Branch<WH6780>, and a King<WH4428> shall reign<WH4427> and prosper<WH7919>, and shall execute<WH6213> judgment<WH4941> and justice<WH6666> in the earth<WH776>.

In his days<WH3117> Judah<WH3063> shall be saved<WH3467>, and Israel<WH3478> shall live<WH7931> safely<WH983>: and this is his name<WH8034> by which he shall be called<WH7121>, THE Lord OUR RIGHTEOUSNESS<WH3072>.

Therefore<WH3117>, behold, the days come<WH935>, says<WH5002> the Lord<WH3068>, that they shall no more say<WH559>, The Lord<WH3068> lives<WH2416>, which brought up<WH5927> the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> out of the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714>;

But<WH3068>, The Lord lives<WH2416>, which brought up<WH5927> and which led<WH935> the seed<WH2233> of the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> out of the north<WH6828> country<WH776>, and from all countries<WH776> where I had driven<WH5080> them<WH3427>; and they shall live in their own land<WH127>.

My heart<WH3820> inside<WH7130> me is broken<WH7665> because of the prophets<WH5030>; all my bones<WH6106> shake<WH7363>; I am like a drunken<WH7910> man<WH376>, and like a man<WH1397> whom wine<WH3196> has overcome<WH5674>, because<WH6440> of the Lord<WH3068>, and because of the words<WH1697> of his holiness<WH6944>.

For the land<WH776> is full<WH4390> of adulterers<WH5003>; for because<WH6440> of swearing<WH423> the land<WH776> mourns<WH56>; the pleasant places<WH4999> of the wilderness<WH4057> are dried up<WH3001>, and their course<WH4794> is evil<WH7451>, and their force is not right<WH1369>.
For both prophet<WH5030> and priest<WH3548> are profane<WH2610>; Yes<WH1004>, in my house have I found<WH4672> their wickedness<WH7451>, says<WH5002> the Lord<WH3068>.

Therefore their way<WH1870> shall be unto them as slippery<WH2519> ways in the darkness<WH653>: they shall be driven on<WH1760>, and fall<WH5307> in it<WH935>: for I will bring evil<WH7451> upon them<WH8141>, even the year of their visitation<WH6486>, says<WH5002> the Lord<WH3068>.
And I have seen<WH7200> wickedness<WH8604> in the prophets<WH5030> of Samaria<WH8111>; they prophesied<WH5012> in Baal<WH1168>, and caused my people<WH5971> Israel<WH3478> to err<WH8582>.

I have seen<WH7200> also in the prophets<WH5030> of Jerusalem<WH3389> a horrible thing<WH8186>: they commit adultery<WH5003>, and walk<WH1980> in lies<WH8267>: they strengthen<WH2388> also the hands<WH3027> of evildoers<WH7489>, that none<WH376> does return<WH7725> from his wickedness<WH7451>: they are all of them unto me as Sodom<WH5467>, and the inhabitants<WH3427> there as Gomorrah<WH6017>.

Therefore thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635> concerning the prophets<WH5030>; Behold<WH398>, I will feed them with wormwood<WH3939>, and make them drink<WH8248> the water<WH4325> of gall<WH7219>: for from the prophets<WH5030> of Jerusalem<WH3389> is profaneness<WH2613> gone forth<WH3318> into all the land<WH776>.

Thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>, Listen<WH8085> not unto the words<WH1697> of the prophets<WH5030> that prophesy<WH5012> unto you<WH1891>: they make you vain: they speak<WH1696> a vision<WH2377> of their own heart<WH3820>, and not out of the mouth<WH6310> of the Lord<WH3068>.

They say<WH559> still<WH559> unto them that despise<WH5006> me<WH3068>, The Lord has said<WH1696>, You shall have peace<WH7965>; and they say<WH559> unto every one that walks<WH1980> after the imagination<WH8307> of his own heart<WH3820>, No evil<WH7451> shall come upon you<WH935>.
For who has stood<WH5975> in the counsel<WH5475> of the Lord<WH3068>, and has perceived<WH7200> and heard<WH8085> his word<WH1697>? who has marked<WH7181> his word<WH1697>, and heard it<WH8085>?

Behold<WH5591>, a whirlwind of the Lord<WH3068> is gone forth<WH3318> in fury<WH2534>, even a severe<WH2342> whirlwind<WH5591>: it shall fall grievously<WH2342> upon the head<WH7218> of the wicked<WH7563>.

The anger<WH639> of the Lord<WH3068> shall not return<WH7725>, until he have executed<WH6213>, and until he have performed<WH6965> the thoughts<WH4209> of his heart<WH3820>: in the latter<WH319> days<WH3117> you shall consider<WH995> it perfectly<WH998>.
I have not sent<WH7971> these prophets<WH5030>, yet they ran<WH7323>: I have not spoken<WH1696> to them<WH5012>, yet they prophesied.

But if they had stood<WH5975> in my counsel<WH5475>, and had caused my people<WH5971> to hear<WH8085> my words<WH1697>, then they should have turned<WH7725> them from their evil<WH7451> way<WH1870>, and from the evil<WH7455> of their doings<WH4611>.
Am I a God<WH430> at hand<WH7138>, says<WH5002> the Lord<WH3068>, and not a God<WH430> afar off<WH7350>?

Can any<WH376> hide<WH5641> himself in secret places<WH4565> that I shall not see<WH7200> him<WH5002>? says the Lord<WH3068>. Do not I fill<WH4392> heaven<WH8064> and earth<WH776>? says<WH5002> the Lord<WH3068>.
I have heard<WH8085> what the prophets<WH5030> said<WH559>, that prophesy<WH5012> lies<WH8267> in my name<WH8034>, saying<WH559>, I have dreamed<WH2492>, I have dreamed<WH2492>.
How long shall this be<WH3426> in the heart<WH3820> of the prophets<WH5030> that prophesy<WH5012> lies<WH8267>? Yes<WH5030>, they are prophets of the deceit<WH8649> of their own heart<WH3820>;

Which think<WH2803> to cause my people<WH5971> to forget<WH7911> my name<WH8034> by their dreams<WH2472> which they tell<WH5608> every man<WH376> to his neighbor<WH7453>, as their fathers<WH1> have forgotten<WH7911> my name<WH8034> for Baal<WH1168>.

The prophet<WH5030> that has a dream<WH2472>, let him tell<WH5608> a dream<WH2472>; and he that has my word<WH1697>, let him speak<WH1696> my word<WH1697> faithfully<WH571>. What is the chaff<WH8401> to the wheat<WH1250>? says<WH5002> the Lord<WH3068>.
Is not my word<WH1697> like<WH3541> as a fire<WH784>? says<WH5002> the Lord<WH3068>; and like a hammer<WH6360> that breaks<WH6327> the rock<WH5553> in pieces<WH6327>?
Therefore<WH5030>, behold, I am against the prophets, says<WH5002> the Lord<WH3068>, that steal<WH1589> my words<WH1697> every one<WH376> from his neighbor<WH7453>.
Behold<WH5030>, I am against the prophets, says<WH5002> the Lord<WH3068>, that use<WH3947> their tongues<WH3956>, and say<WH5001>, He says<WH5002>.

Behold<WH5012>, I am against them that prophesy false<WH8267> dreams<WH2472>, says<WH5002> the Lord<WH3068>, and do tell<WH5608> them<WH5971>, and cause my people to err<WH8582> by their lies<WH8267>, and by their lightness<WH6350>; yet I sent<WH7971> them not<WH6680>, nor commanded them<WH3276>: therefore they shall not profit this people<WH5971> at all<WH3276>, says<WH5002> the Lord<WH3068>.

And when this people<WH5971>, or the prophet<WH5030>, or a priest<WH3548>, shall ask<WH7592> you<WH559>, saying, What is the burden<WH4853> of the Lord<WH3068>? you shall then say<WH559> unto them<WH4853>, What burden? I will even forsake<WH5203> you<WH5002>, says the Lord<WH3068>.

And as for the prophet<WH5030>, and the priest<WH3548>, and the people<WH5971>, that shall say<WH559>, The burden<WH4853> of the Lord<WH3068>, I will even punish<WH6485> that man<WH376> and his house<WH1004>.

Thus shall you say<WH559> every one<WH376> to his neighbor<WH7453>, and every one<WH376> to his brother<WH251>, What has the Lord<WH3068> answered<WH6030>? and<WH3068>, What has the Lord spoken<WH1696>?

And the burden<WH4853> of the Lord<WH3068> shall you mention<WH2142> no more<WH376>: for every man's word<WH1697> shall be his burden<WH4853>; for you have perverted<WH2015> the words<WH1697> of the living<WH2416> God<WH430>, of the Lord<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635> our God<WH430>.
Thus shall you say<WH559> to the prophet<WH5030>, What has the Lord<WH3068> answered<WH6030> you<WH3068>? and, What has the Lord spoken<WH1696>?

But<WH518> since you say<WH559>, The burden<WH4853> of the Lord<WH3068>; therefore thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH3068>; Because you say<WH559> this word<WH1697>, The burden<WH4853> of the Lord<WH3068>, and I have sent<WH7971> unto you<WH559>, saying, You shall not say<WH559>, The burden<WH4853> of the Lord<WH3068>;

Therefore<WH5377>, behold, I, even I, will utterly forget<WH5382> you<WH5203>, and I will forsake you<WH5892>, and the city that I gave<WH5414> you and your fathers<WH1>, and cast you out of my presence<WH6440>:
And I will bring<WH5414> a everlasting<WH5769> reproach<WH2781> upon you<WH5769>, and a perpetual shame<WH3640>, which shall not be forgotten<WH7911>.
